thread.title: Valencia alum Madison Shipman to sign autographs in SCV
thread.title_full: Valencia alum Madison Shipman to sign autographs in SCV

author: Dan Agnew
title: Valencia alum Madison Shipman to sign autographs in SCV
text:
Posted: October 14, 2015 10:59   14, 2015 10:59 p.m. Valencia High School graduate Madison Shipman is an infielder for the USSSA Pride professional softball team. A A A 
Former Valencia High player and professional softball player Madison Shipman will be available to sign autographs on Thursday at a local sporting goods store. 
Shipman will be available from 4-6 p.m. at Bagger Sports located at 23460 Cinema Drive in Valencia to promote her newly launched bat line called Team Combat Madison Shipman. 
This is her first public appearance since she joined the USSSA Pride of the National Pro Fastpitch professional softball league. She was drafted second overall in 2014 by the Pride, who are based in Kissimmee, Florida. 
Before that, Shipman had successful careers at both Valencia High School and the University of Tennessee, where she was a two-time first-team All-American shortstop. While at Valencia, she was a Cal-Hi Sports All-State selection and CIF-Southern Section Division Player of the Year in 2010. 
She also played for Valenciaâ€™s back-to-back CIF championship winning teams in 2007 and 2008.
